content: Thank you for writing this. As someone who lived in China and has seen these groups in China as well, I completely agree with you that we need to see the Chinese in context of their recent history and the times they grew up in. Living through the Great Depression and Cultural Revolution would irrevocably change anyone. We are all people shaped by our contexts and histories, and it’s unfair to demonize people without understanding their past, and only then can we appreciate their present.
